name: BoxMan Rising Lite
description:
-------------------------------------------------
The best fighting game : BOXMAN RISING
-------------------------------------------------

Dominated by gangs, the Boxman World is infested with disorder, crime and chaos.
You’ve been training hard for a very long time. It’s finally time to get rid of them.
However, the gangs won’t be that easy to deal with.
Must get stronger, Must learn more skills, And I must be the world’s strongest fighter.

-------------------------------------------------
FEATURES:

•Retina display support for incredible HD
•Highly advanced operating and attack system.
•Three different types of action
•Over 50 different skills
•Over 10 different Items
•Over 40 stages in the game world
•Capability to acquire enemy’s skill
•Possibility to Upgrade and increase your skills
•Lethal moves
•Strong partner to help you fight
-------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------
Other games made by Goorusoft

•WarShip
•MetalWars
•MetalWars2 : Revolution
-------------------------------------------------
